critique: The document is a formal authorization for the Secretary of the Navy to enlist Filipinos into the Insular Force of the United States Navy. The language is factual and administrative, with no explicit emotional expression. Therefore, the initial scores for all emotions are set to 1, indicating a neutral emotional tone. There is no indication of joy, sadness, fear, disgust, or surprise in the text. The revised scores remain the same as the initial scores, reflecting the absence of emotional content.
